easy.q: I have a face but no eyes. I wear a smile of numbers, and I tell you what time it is. What am I?
easy.hint: It helps you tell hours and minutes.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer remains. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a small amount and how adding letters changes it.

hard.q: A maze has exits A and B. You move one step at a time. Each turn you choose left or right, but you never repeat a corridor. Is it possible to reach an exit without retracing steps? Explain briefly.
